description: Prime Minister Aleksandar Vucic of Serbia said his government would donate five million euros to rejuvenate the eastern Bosnian town of Srebrenica, where 8,000 Muslim men and boys were massacred in 1995.
title: Serbia Donates Money to Srebrenica
title_page: Serbia Donates Money to Srebrenica - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Prime Minister Aleksandar Vucic of Serbia said his government would donate five million euros to rejuvenate the eastern Bosnian town of Srebrenica, where 8,000 Muslim men and boys were massacred in 1995.
